title: "Moro Light: Fabrica de Tabacos" Cigar Label
provenance: Ellery Karl, OK Harris Gallery, 383 West Broadway, New York, NY
description: Label with red and metallic-gold bordered oval cartouche, within which is a light house and distant port city. In beams of light from the light house: "MORO LIGHT". Metallic gold coins, crests and text:"SUPERIORES" ornament cartouche border. Text, above light house: "FABRICA DE TABACOS"; in red banner-shape, bottom margin: "MORO LIGHT".
name: Ephemera
